actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conduct of a study and report concerning the ability of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to address the growing threat of viral epidemics and biological and chemical terrorism.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to study, and report to the appropriate congressional committees on, the ability of, and resources available to, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to address the growing threats of viral epidemics and biologic and chemical terrorism.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conduct of a study and report concerning the ability of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to address the growing threat of viral epidemics and biological and chemical terrorism.
